Respect their need for space when required.

Help manage medical appointments and transportation.
Organize a support network with family and friends.

Ensure they stay hydrated and maintain proper nutrition during treatment.
Research treatment options and side effects to help them make informed decisions.
Accompany them to medical visits for emotional and logistical support.
Keep track of medications and treatment schedules.
Engage them in light activities that bring joy (movies, books, music).
Encourage social connections while respecting their energy levels.
Offer to help with childcare or work-related responsibilities.
